Little Flower School.Address: C-Block, Shivaji Park, yaha pe block ni hote.

Reviews.Aditya Birla: Viswaas hai, isme kuch khaas hai. Darne ki kya baat hai, jab khuda apne saath hai.
Reviews.Jatin Ahuja: O me kya, kaafi dhamaakedaar school hai eh. Paaji, tussi bina soche samjhe admission pa lo.

Reviews.Ashok Kumar: Bhot hi tagda school hai bruh. Kaafi maza aaya idhar padh ke. Bas canteen thodi nakli hai baaki sab ek number.
Reviews.Manmohan Singh: Mujhe jyada acha ni laga frankly speaking. Ye log bolte hai ki science me bhot scope hai, I mean like seriously ?
